require(plotly)

theme_set(theme_bw(base_size = 26))

hours19 <- hours19 %>%
  mutate(date = lubridate::mdy_hm(StartDate)) %>%
  filter(date >= lubridate::mdy_hms('8/31/2019 12:00:00'))
hours19 <- hours19 %>% group_by(Q1) %>%
  summarize(total_hours = sum(Q2_1, na.rm = TRUE))
